title: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
description: When using Ctrl+M (Add Import), nothing happens because of the trailing whitespace within the selection.
OB: When I select a portion of the code, including leading or trailing whitespace, and use Ctrl+M (Add Import), the action does not have any effect.
EB: After fixing the issue, when I select a portion of the code that includes leading or trailing whitespace and use Ctrl+M (Add Import), the action should add the necessary import statement to the code and not be affected by the whitespace.
SR: The Add Import functionality should ignore leading and trailing whitespace when it is selected and continue to work properly.
